xmpp.Message

type
class
extends
Packet
available in
flash, js, neko, php
XMPP message packet.
Default type of message packets is 'normal' (if you set it to null), but the class assigns 'chat' as default in the constructor.

Static Methods

parse(x : Xml) : Message
